text: Roberto Mazzoni (born 9 January 1937) is an Italian former sports shooter. He competed in the 25 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Italy Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Florence
title: Roberto Mazzoni
